# FloatingPointClassification.signalingNaN

**Case**

A signaling NaN (“not a number”).

## Declaration

```swift
case signalingNaN
```

## Discussion

A signaling NaN sets the floating-point exception status when used in many floating-point operations.
title: FloatingPointClassification.signalingNaN
